TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit ResourcePermissionBase extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public MustInherit Class ResourcePermissionBase Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class ResourcePermissionBase abstract : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 允许控制代码访问安全权限。

span.span: Allows control of code access security permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类将使用序号排序规则的字符串比较，并忽略所比较的字符串的大小写。The class compares strings using ordinal sort rules and ignores the case of the strings being compared. ## Examples 下面的示例继承自类。The following example inherits from the class. 实现 4 种构造函数。4 kinds of constructors are implemented. 该示例还提供了一个名为类的实现`MailslotPermissionEntry`。The example also provides an implementation of a class called `MailslotPermissionEntry`. 属性私下然后设置为的类型`MailslotPermissionEntry`。The property is then privately set to the type of `MailslotPermissionEntry`. 属性私下设置为"名称"和"计算机"。The property is set privately to "Name" and "Machine". [!code-cpp[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/CPP/resourcepermissionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/CS/resourcepermissionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ResourcePermissionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ResourcePermissionBase/VB/resourcepermissionbase.vb#1)]

span.span: for the right to control evidence.

para.span: 继承自，你必须提供至少三个构造函数，设置两个属性，并提供第三个属性。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must provide at least three constructors, set two properties, and provide a third property.

para.span: 所需的构造函数是： 默认构造函数、 采用作为参数，并尽可能多根据需要采用属性的值。

span.span: The required constructors are: a default constructor, one that takes a as a parameter, and as many as needed that take values for the properties.
The properties that need to be set are and .

para.span: 需要第三个属性是指返回的权限条目。

span.span: The third property that is needed is one that returns the permission entries.

span.span: In , the property is set privately to "Machine" and "Category", the property is privately set to the type of , and the property returns the permission entries.

A copy of the current permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限对象的副本与原始的权限对象的资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of the permission object represents the same access to resources as the original permission object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 与当前权限对象类型相同的权限对象。

span.span: A permission object of the same type as the current permission object.

summary.span: 创建并返回作为当前权限对象和目标权限对象的交集的权限对象。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission object that is the intersection of the current permission object and a target permission object.

returns.span: 表示当前对象和指定目标交集的新权限对象。

span.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current object and the specified target.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此对象为 。

span.span: This object is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限对象的交集是描述组的二者共同持有的操作的权限。The intersection of two permission objects is a permission that describes the set of operations they both hold in common. 具体而言，它表示传递两个权限的请求所需的最低权限。Specifically, it represents the minimum permissions required for a demand to pass both permissions.

exception.span: 目标权限对象与当前权限对象不属于同一类型。

span.span: The target permission object is not of the same type as the current permission object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 将用于测试子集关系的权限对象。

span.span: A permission object that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

summary.span: 确定当前权限对象是否是指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限对象是指定权限对象的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限对象指定一组完全包含指定的权限对象的操作，当前权限对象是指定的权限对象的子集。The current permission object is a subset of the specified permission object if the current permission object specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission object. 例如，表示对 C:\Example.txt 访问权限的权限是到 c： 表示访问权限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\Example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前权限对象表示对受保护资源的访问权限不会超过指定的权限对象。If this method returns `true`, the current permission object represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission object. 此方法始终返回`false`指定的权限对象时的与当前权限对象的类型不同。This method always returns `false` when the specified permission object is of a different type than that of the current permission object.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示该权限是否不受限制。

span.span: if permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有不受限制的权限的对象表示对权限所保护的所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission object represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前的权限对象合并的权限对象。

span.span: A permission object to combine with the current permission object.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限对象的类型相同。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission object.

summary.span: 创建将当前权限对象与目标权限对象组合的权限对象。

span.span: Creates a permission object that combines the current permission object and the target permission object.

returns.span: 新权限对象，它表示当前权限对象和指定权限对象的并集。

span.span: A new permission object that represents the union of the current permission object and the specified permission object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是表示当前权限对象和指定的权限对象所表示的所有操作的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission object and the specified permission object. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.

exception.span: 权限对象与当前权限对象不属于同一类型。

span.span: The permission object is not of the same type as the current permission object.
